SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CollectionDataHandler
The CollectionDataHandler class implements the DataHandler interface to handle data using an in-memory collection.
DataHandler
The DataHandler interface provides methods for writing and reading data.
FileDataHandler
The FileDataHandler class implements the DataHandler interface to handle data using a file.
FizzBuzzExecutor
Executes the FizzBuzzManager in a multi-threaded environment, managing the collection and output of results.
FizzBuzzManager
Manages the execution of FizzBuzz tasks in a multi-threaded environment, allowing concurrent generation of Fizz, Buzz, FizzBuzz, and number outputs.
Main
The Main class contains the entry point of the application.
SchedulerController
The SchedulerController class manages the scheduling of tasks to write data at regular intervals.
Timer
The Timer class provides methods to get the current time formatted as a string and to get a message indicating that 5 seconds have passed.
